医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，心脏健康的行为可能会减缓生物衰老根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项开放获取的新研究，更好的心脏健康的好处可能与心脏健康的生活方式因素对生物衰老（身体及其细胞的年龄）的积极影响有关。 ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-behaviors-may-slow-biological-aging-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-behaviors-may-slow-biological-aging-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65263818-7bc2-41d1-8d07-14c4d6ffa629 Wed, 29 May 2024 07:41:00 -0400 Heart healthy behaviors may slow biological aging, research shows
研究深入了解多动症的早期发育风险因素一些早期发育因素与儿童期和青春期 ADHD 风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-offers-insight-into-early-developmental-risk-factors-for-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-offers-insight-into-early-developmental-risk-factors-for-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f18f978-96df-4085-8abf-5bfb173cc9e2 Wed, 29 May 2024 07:27:27 -0400 Study offers insight into early developmental risk factors for ADHD
田纳西州给予这家医院垄断企业 A 级——即使它报告失败田纳西州的一家机构本应对美国最大的国家认可的垄断医院进行问责和评级，只要报告任何价值，就对数十项护理质量衡量标准给予全额信用——无论其医院的实际表现如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Tennessee-gives-this-hospital-monopoly-an-A-grade-e28094-even-when-it-reports-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Tennessee-gives-this-hospital-monopoly-an-A-grade-e28094-even-when-it-reports-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d318aa3d-6f3f-4d6e-b8d6-19032f1aba46 Wed, 29 May 2024 07:02:19 -0400 Tennessee gives this hospital monopoly an A grade — even when it reports failure
精神药物正在风靡一时。 FDA 很快就会介入。洛里·蒂普顿 (Lori Tipton) 是越来越多的人中的一员，他们表示 MDMA（也称为摇头丸）拯救了他们的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Psychoactive-drugs-are-having-a-moment-The-FDA-will-soon-weigh-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Psychoactive-drugs-are-having-a-moment-The-FDA-will-soon-weigh-in.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e827ced-1739-4657-b955-5b0026b3abb7 Wed, 29 May 2024 07:00:46 -0400 Psychoactive drugs are having a moment. The FDA will soon weigh in.
农场工人面临着感染禽流感的高风险，但检测并未覆盖到他们农场工人面临着禽流感病毒最严重的暴露，但倡导者表示，他们中的许多人在生病时将缺乏资源来依靠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Farmworkers-face-high-risk-exposures-to-bird-flu-but-testing-isne28099t-reaching-them.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Farmworkers-face-high-risk-exposures-to-bird-flu-but-testing-isne28099t-reaching-them.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b786d62-38b4-4561-bdd2-66fc06fd50e6 Wed, 29 May 2024 06:58:57 -0400 Farmworkers face high-risk exposures to bird flu, but testing isn’t reaching them
Cellular Origins 与 Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult 合作展示 CGT 制造的通用自动化Cellular Origins 是一家 TTP 公司，专注于实现细胞和基因疗法 (CGT) 的可扩展、经济高效且高效的制造，而细胞和基因疗法弹射器 (CGT Catapult) 是一家独立的创新和技术组织，专门致力于推进细胞和基因疗法的发展。细胞和基因治疗行业今天宣布合作，展示 CGT 制造的通用自动化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Cellular-Origins-and-Cell-and-Gene-Therapy-Catapult-collaborate-to-demonstrate-universal-automation-of-CGT-manufacturing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Cellular-Origins-and-Cell-and-Gene-Therapy-Catapult-collaborate-to-demonstrate-universal-automation-of-CGT-manufacturing.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ebf27df-d612-460e-b35a-283fb664dfd0 Wed, 29 May 2024 06:49:00 -0400 Cellular Origins and Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult collaborate to demonstrate universal automation of CGT manufacturing

为什么使用光散射来分析蛋白质和病毒载体？在本次采访中，Wyatt Technology 分析科学高级总监 Michelle Chen 博士向 NewsMedical 讲述了如何使用光散射技术来分析蛋白质的多属性定量 (MAQ)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Why-use-light-scattering-to-analyze- Proteins-and-viral-vectors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Why-use-light-scattering-to-analyze- Proteins-and-viral-vectors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0ec396e-1de5-4b0e-9e18-e475520bde4f Wed, 29 May 2024 05:32:00 -0400 Why use light scattering to analyze proteins and viral vectors?
GLP-1 受体激动剂可有效减轻非糖尿病肥胖患者的体重起始胰高血糖素样肽 1 (GLP-1) 受体激动剂 (RA) 与安慰剂干预的利弊平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/GLP-1-receptor-agonists- effective-for-weight-loss-in-obesity-without-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/GLP-1-receptor-agonists- effective-for-weight-loss-in-obesity-without-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ca4fac-fbce-43bf-9197-965841adae53 Wed, 29 May 2024 04:59:00 -0400 GLP-1 receptor agonists effective for weight loss in obesity without diabetes
RNAConnect, Inc. 正式成立，推动 RNA 分析领先的生命科学试剂公司 RNAConnect 今天正式成立，承诺为探索现实世界中 RNA 序列和结构的多样性提供突破性的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/RNAConnect-Inc-formally-launches-today-to-drive-RNA-analysis-with-innovative-research-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/RNAConnect-Inc-formally-launches-today-to-drive-RNA-analysis-with-innovative-research-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e58e21ae-e70c-45cd-8a4f-9047436ef6ec Wed, 29 May 2024 04:24:00 -0400 RNAConnect, Inc. formally launches to drive RNA analysis
